# Java 开发利器 Myeclipse 全面详解（北风网）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/java-kaifa-liqi-myeclipse-quanmian-xiangjie-beifeng-wang
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/java-kaifa-liqi-myeclipse-quanmian-xiangjie-beifeng-wang
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install java-kaifa-liqi-myeclipse-quanmian-xiangjie-beifeng-wang
java-kaifa-liqi-myeclipse-quanmian-xiangjie-beifeng-wang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g java-kaifa-liqi-myeclipse-quanmian-xiangjie-beifeng-wang
java-kaifa-liqi-myeclipse-quanmian-xiangjie-beifeng-wang <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
